title: Apple Announces M4 Pro Chip: Up to 14-Core CPU, Up to 20-Core GPU, Up to 64GB of RAM, and More
content:
Apple today unveiled the M4 Pro chip, with key specifications including up to a 14-core CPU, up to a 20-core GPU, a 16-core Neural Engine, and up to 64GB of RAM.


Apple says the M4 Pro chip features "the world's fastest CPU core" with "lightning-fast single-threaded performance."

The first Mac equipped with the M4 Pro chip is the new Mac mini, also announced today. Apple is also expected to introduce updated 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M4, M4 Pro, and M4 Max chip options later this week.

The previous-generation M3 Pro chip has up to a 12-core CPU and up to an 18-core GPU, so the M4 Pro chip further advances performance and power efficiency.

This story will be updated with more details.
Tag: Apple Silicon
